notes: Added a beginner-friendly in-app wizard explaining Gmail App Password generation (enable 2-Step Verification first, then App Passwords).
Improved Yahoo SMTP setup guide with step-by-step accordion for non-technical users.
Email Settings screen now provides copy/paste Gmail and Yahoo SMTP configuration blocks with common errors and troubleshooting.
Implemented automatic whitespace removal on paste/input in the SMTP password field to prevent authentication failures.
Added new Sider menu entry 'Website' that opens https://pausaler.rs/ in the user's default browser using Tauri Shell open().
Enhanced the public homepage (GitHub Pages) with dynamic display of the latest application version from latest.json, with Releases fallback.
Introduced SmartScreen guidance text after installation to clarify unknown publisher warnings.
Prepared support for alternative Windows packaging formats (NSIS and MSI) without changing existing licensing logic.
